summary: Completed comprehensive testing of tax reporting feature. Backend API endpoints are working correctly with minor calculation discrepancy. Frontend UI components are fully functional with proper tab navigation, tax status display, and data visualization.

minor_issues.issue: Category breakdown tax total ($446.0) doesn't match monthly tax total ($304.5)
minor_issues.impact: Data inconsistency in tax reporting aggregation

passed_tests: Tax summary includes daily, weekly, monthly tax collected stats
Tax summary includes category breakdown with exempt/taxable status
Tax summary includes taxable_vs_exempt totals and calculations
Reports page has Sales, Tax, and Inventory tabs working correctly
Tax Reports tab shows tax status banner (Tax is Enabled)
Tax Reports tab displays daily/weekly/monthly tax stats ($304.50 each)
Tax Reports tab shows taxable vs exempt visual breakdown (83% vs 17%)
Tax Reports tab shows category breakdown table with 6 categories
Category breakdown table shows proper structure (Category, Status, Sales, Tax)
Tab switching works correctly between all three tabs
Tax status banner shows current rate (10%) and exempt categories (part, screen)
Taxable vs exempt calculations display correctly ($4460 taxable, $910 exempt)
Category exemption logic works correctly (part and screen marked as EXEMPT)
Frontend-backend integration for tax reporting data is working
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Investigate tax calculation aggregation discrepancy in /api/reports/tax-summary where category breakdown totals don't match monthly totals
